name: Quiet Little Things
description:
Quiet little things
Need your voice in the wind
Sonic waves and good will

--

Art: Rosa Carbo-Mascarell
Code: Sean Soraghan
Design: Federico Fasce, Tim Phillips
Production: Laura Enria
Sound: Anne-Sophie Ouvrier

--

Use your voice to move through this vignette game. Made during the Global Game Jam 2017.
